Hiking Trips

The club will organize bi-weekly hiking trips to various state and national parks. (This is in addition to various social events organized)

Community Service

We are commited to work with various environmental groups to help transform Austin into a greener and cleaner place to live.

Meetings

Meetings will occure on a monthly basis. Members are not required to attend meetings, but meetings help to outline all the activities planned by TAT for that month.

Contact

Feel free to reach out to us at TexasAdventureTime@gmail.com
